price: 48. Ir kai jiems sakoma: „Nusilenkite (maldoje)!“, jie nenusilenkia.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
